sentence.text: She tried to strangle her three-month-old daughter and then her lover arrived to finish the evil deed .
` You have come into our priory to insinuate that evil deeds have been committed , " she snapped .
Unlike her husband who has gained in strength because of his evil deeds , she is destroyed by them .
He gave me an evil grin , knowing just what dissension he had sown in Wavebreaker 's crew , then he was gone .
Bill 's face took on an evil grin .
The English , or for that matter , people anywhere , have not got a monopoly on stupidity and evil intent .
Pockets were emptied of loose change , parcels scanned as if for a malignant tumour and handbags rifled for evidence of evil intent .
Evil intent was an essential element in the crime of assault , the sheriff said .
Ritual statements were made after atrocities , with party spokesmen ironically condemning ` evil men of violence " for subverting the democratic process .
You ask whether we are good or evil men .
Evil men may be reborn as sub-human animals , but virtuous men have at least the prospect that they may escape from the cycle of rebirths into the nirvana of final extinction .
Not only does he appear in many guises -- far more than the few I have mentioned here -- but the Devil seems to be chief of the evil spirits .
An exorcism is the casting out of an evil spirit from a person .
It goes with Elrond 's firm statement even earlier that ` nothing is evil in the beginning .
She did not want to be evil with Ryan either , but fortunately , Ryan understood all that .
The name given to a demonic or maniacal GHOST of someone who had been evil during his lifetime .
And the creatures of the Dark Ireland , Grainne , are soulless and cruel and evil beyond your comprehension .
And that leads the main question of this issue : would the girls have been as evil at the end ?
` Things are looking up already , " he murmured with an evil leer .
Think of the princess in The Arabian Nights , for instance , who distracted the king from his evil intentions for one thousand and one nights , by telling him a different story every night .
The members of the Rising wrote to Henry VIII insisting that he should dismiss his evil counsellors .
Archbishop Aethelberht is said not to have spared evil kings , and there must be a possibility that he was soon as disenchanted with Aethelred 's faction as he had been with Alhred 's .
` Who can have done this evil thing ? "
They are deadly enemies of the camp of the local tyrants and evil gentry and attack without the slightest hesitation .
All the above examples of deaths , injuries , and economic losses caused by corporate acts are not the antics of one or two evil , or mentally disturbed , or relatively deprived senior employees .
But remember that he is evil .
Going and having a few meals with him did n't seem evil or furtive in any way .
This evil and sadistic Tory government are responsible for destroying millions of jobs as a conscious policy and continue to pursue the toll with further deliberating tactics like V A T on fuel .
